name: Contract Title
desc: Title or subject of the agreement
title: Contract Title

name: Contract Type
desc: Type of contract such as Agreement NDA MOU etc
title: Contract Type

name: Related Master Agreement
desc: Reference to framework or umbrella agreements
title: Related Master Agreement

name: Project Business Unit
desc: Division or project linked to the contract
title: Project Business Unit

name: Contracting Entity
desc: DHI legal entity executing the agreement
title: Contracting Entity

name: Counterparty Legal Names
desc: Full legal names of all counterparties
title: Counterparty Names

name: Counterparty Contact Person
desc: Name designation email phone of contact
title: Counterparty Contact Person

name: Notice Period
desc: Notice period for termination or renewal
title: Notice Period

name: Currency
desc: Currency type such as USD BTN INR
title: Currency

name: Payment Terms
desc: Payment structure such as Net30 milestone based
title: Payment Terms

name: Price Escalation Revision Clause
desc: Clause for price change if applicable
title: Price Escalation Revision Clause

name: Compliance Requirements
desc: Compliance obligations such as AML ESG
title: Compliance Requirements

name: Current Status
desc: Stage such as Draft Signed Active
title: Current Status

name: Renewal Alert Period
desc: Number of days before renewal alert
title: Renewal Alert Period

name: Audit Compliance Check Dates
desc: Dates for audit or compliance reviews
title: Audit Compliance Check Dates
